xmlText.p: First Period_1, Washington, Ovechkin 33 (Carlson, Kuznetsov), 4:20 (pp). 2, Detroit, Abdelkader 9 (Nielsen), 13:37. Penalties_Glendening, DET, (tripping), 3:21; Abdelkader, DET, (slashing), 15:49.
